Roles.title: Software Developer
Roles.description: Responsible for designing, coding, and maintaining applications. This role requires a strong understanding of software development principles and often involves working closely with other team members to ensure smooth and efficient software delivery.

Roles.title: Sr Software Engineer
Roles.description: A senior-level role that involves leading the design and development of software projects. This position requires extensive experience and often involves mentoring junior team members, making architectural decisions, and ensuring that software meets quality standards.

Roles.title: Frontend Developer
Roles.description: Specializes in building the user interface and user experience aspects of a web application. This role requires strong skills in web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks like React or Angular.

Roles.title: Backend Developer
Roles.description: Focuses on server-side logic, integration, and database management. This role requires expertise in server languages like Java, Python, or Ruby, and a strong understanding of database technologies and architecture.

Roles.title: Full Stack Developer
Roles.description: A versatile role involving both frontend and backend development. Full Stack Developers are adept at handling multiple technologies and are capable of building complete web applications.

Roles.title: DevOps Engineer
Roles.description: Responsible for bridging the gap between software development and IT operations. This role involves automating and streamlining operations and processes, building and maintaining tools for deployment, monitoring, and operations.

Roles.title: Software Architect
Roles.description: In charge of making high-level design choices and dictating technical standards, including software coding standards, tools, and platforms. This role requires a deep understanding of architectural styles and design patterns.

Roles.title: Systems Engineer
Roles.description: Focuses on designing and implementing computer systems and networks. This role requires a broad knowledge of hardware and software, and the ability to integrate and build complex systems.

Roles.title: QA Engineer
Roles.description: Ensures the quality of software by designing and implementing tests to find bugs and improve performance. This role requires a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of software testing techniques.

Roles.title: Data Engineer
Roles.description: Specializes in preparing 'big data' for analytical or operational uses. This role requires strong skills in database technology, data modeling, and ETL processes.

Roles.title: Machine Learning Engineer
Roles.description: Focuses on designing and creating systems that can learn from and make decisions based on data. This role requires a strong background in data science, statistics, and software engineering.

Roles.title: Mobile Developer
Roles.description: Specializes in developing applications for mobile platforms such as iOS and Android. This role requires knowledge of mobile frameworks and an understanding of user interface and user experience principles.

Roles.title: Cloud Engineer
Roles.description: Focuses on designing, implementing, and managing cloud-based solutions. This role requires knowledge of cloud service providers like AWS, Azure, or GCP, and an understanding of cloud architecture and services.

Roles.title: Security Engineer
Roles.description: Responsible for ensuring that software systems are secure against cyber threats. This role involves assessing software for vulnerabilities, implementing security measures, and monitoring systems for potential breaches.

Roles.title: Blockchain Developer
Roles.description: Specializes in developing and implementing blockchain solutions and smart contracts. This role requires a deep understanding of blockchain technology, cryptography, and consensus algorithms.
